title: Author Correction: Global potential for natural regeneration in deforested tropical regions
author: Brooke A. Williams

Nature (2024)Cite this article

Subjects

Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-024-08106-4 Published online 30 October 2024

In the version of the article initially published, in the Brazil section of Fig. 2, the land area with potential for natural regeneration was shown given as 55.1 Mha and has now been corrected to 43.71 Mha in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
